name: SCNBillboardAxis
desc: Options for locking the orientation of nodes affected by a billboard constraint.

items.name: static var X: SCNBillboardAxis
items.desc: Align an affected node such that its x-axis is always parallel to that of the view, leaving it free to rotate otherwise.

items.name: static var Y: SCNBillboardAxis
items.desc: Align an affected node such that its y-axis is always parallel to that of the view, leaving it free to rotate otherwise.

items.name: static var Z: SCNBillboardAxis
items.desc: Align an affected node such that its z-axis is always perpendicular to the viewing plane, leaving it free to rotate otherwise.

items.name: static var all: SCNBillboardAxis
items.desc: Align an affected node such that its orientation always matches that of the view.
